data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Upgrade offers at entry". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Complete Audit Trail. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
